message.body: Are you going to class tomorrow morning?

I might come. I went to Angie's class last week and we did Pilates and where you don't keep your back sealed. I called her over bc I was struggling and she took me through several sets trying different things but nothing felt quite right.
I had some minor low back pain that turned major over the next few days. Couldn't bend over. Back in crazy spasms!!!! Had acupuncture Friday and its much better now but still not fixed!!!!
I'm a little afraid class with Morgan could go either way. He will either be know it all or super helpful.
Hey, sorry, I was out late and didn't want to wake you with text. Did you go? How's your back now? Poor back. Xxxxxx
I did go. Morgan didn't understand how bad my back was. I can't do plank!!! :( But my back isn't spasming. It's just sort of stiff and weird now. Hopefully healed soon! xxxxxxxxxxxx
Is it mid or lower back? If it's mid, maybe I can help, that's what mine was. xxxxx
